project_abstract.cdata: The project intends to expand private investment in non-traditional export and import-substitution industries, and projects in less-developed areas, through provision of foreign exchange for term financing; to continue the institutional development of BSB, with particular emphasis on economic and sector review activities; and, to develop coordinated mechanisms to reduce private sector arrears on term loans from the banking system.
